errors.inputRequired: EA name and Account ID are required
errors.validationRequired: License key and Account ID are required

success.generatedDesc: Encrypted license key has been generated

preparation.title: Preparation
preparation.description: Create necessary items for license application Google Form
preparation.googleFormDesc: Create the following question items in your application form (items marked with <required>{required}</required> are required):

gasIntegration.title: Google Form Integration (GAS)
gasIntegration.description: Create a new Google Apps Script project and configure using the provided template
newProjectSteps: Change project name to "EA License Application"
gasIntegration.codePreparationDesc: Click the button below to download the GAS template file (`gas-template.gs`).
gasIntegration.codePastingDesc: Open the downloaded `gas-template.gs` file, copy its entire contents, and paste it into the Google Apps Script editor. Replace all existing code.
gasIntegration.formFieldsAdjustmentDesc: Adjust the `FORM_FIELDS` object in the script to match your actual Google Form questions. The keys (e.g., `EA_NAME`) are fixed, but the values (e.g., `"Please enter your EA name"`) need to match your form's question text.
gasIntegration.formFieldsExample: Example: If your form question is "Please enter your EA name"

integrationTest.title: Perform Integration Test
integrationTest.description: Execute test functions within Google Apps Script to verify configuration and communication
configValidationSteps: Click "Run" in the Google Apps Script editor menu
Hover over "Execute function" and select "validateConfig" from the dropdown
After execution, check the "Execution log" at the bottom of the editor for the message "✅ Configuration is normal"
integrationTest.configValidationNote: If an error occurs: Please recheck the configuration values in the `CONFIG` section of the script.
communicationTestSteps: Again, click "Run" in the top menu
Hover over "Execute function" and select "testWebhook" from the dropdown
After execution, check the "Execution log" for the message "✅ Test successful"

moduleDownload.title: Download License Authentication Modules
moduleDownload.description: Obtain license authentication modules for integration into EA
moduleDownload.installationDesc: Place downloaded files in the correct locations
notes: To allow DLL usage, check "Allow DLL imports" in MetaTrader 5 settings
If antivirus software blocks the DLL, configure exclusion settings

eaIntegration.title: Integrate Authentication Module into EA
eaIntegration.description: Integrate downloaded modules into Expert Advisor
eaIntegration.overviewDesc: Integrate SANKEY license authentication functionality into Expert Advisor and implement proper authentication flow.

downloadUrlSetup.title: Set EA Download URL
downloadUrlSetup.description: Configure URL for authenticated users to download EA
downloadUrlSetup.overviewDesc: Build a system that allows users who have completed license authentication to safely download EA files.

developer.dllDesc: Windows DLL for license verification functions
developer.getLicenseInfoDesc: Retrieves detailed information about the license.
developer.integrationGuideDesc: Complete guide for integrating SANKEY license verification into your Expert Advisors
developer.mqhDesc: Include our header file for easy license verification
developer.obfuscateKey: Obfuscate your license key in the code
developer.step1Desc: Download the SANKEY MQH header file and DLL library from the links above.
developer.step2Desc: Add the SANKEY header file to your EA and import the necessary functions.
developer.step3Desc: Add license verification in your EA's OnInit() function.
developer.step4Desc: Add periodic license checks to prevent unauthorized usage.
developer.verifyLicenseDesc: Verifies if the provided license key is valid for the given account number.
developer.verifyLicenseReturn: true if license is valid, false otherwise

dialog.approveDescription: Are you sure you want to approve this application? A license key will be issued to the user.
dialog.deactivateMessage: Are you sure you want to deactivate the license for
dialog.deactivateDescription: This operation cannot be undone. It will be deactivated at the next license check.
dialog.deactivateWarning: This action cannot be undone. The license will be deactivated during the next license check.
dialog.licenseWarning: This license information is confidential. Please manage it securely.
dialog.rejectMessage: Are you sure you want to reject the application for
dialog.rejectWarning: This action cannot be undone. The application will be permanently rejected.
dialog.stopSendingDescription: Are you sure you want to stop sending this notification? The scheduled sending will be cancelled.
